title: Chairman SUPARCO thanks govt, praises Pakistan-China teams for HS-1 satellite success
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 19 (APP): Chairman of SUPARCO, Muhammad Yousaf Khan Sunday thanked the government for its strong support and praised the Pakistan-China scientists and technical teams working on the HS-1 satellite, highlighting their skill and commitment as a symbol of robust bilateral cooperation.

In an exclusive statement to the media, the Chairman recognized the HS-1 satellite launch as a historic advancement in Pakistan-China space partnership, stressing its strategic value and offering congratulations to both Pakistani and Chinese nations for this achievement.

He acknowledged Pakistan’s expanding technological capabilities and the key role played by SUPARCO in this important achievement.

He noted that the HS-1 satellite will significantly boost Pakistan’s capabilities in areas such as precision agriculture, environmental monitoring, urban planning, and disaster management.

The satellite’s high-resolution data will improve resource management and help the country better tackle climate-related challenges, he added.

Expressing pride in this achievement, he said the project is a milestone for Pakistan, showcasing the nation’s growing technological strength and commitment to innovation, adding, the successful collaboration on HS-1 makes the country proud and enhances its resilience in the face of future challenges.
